name: The Legend of Penshoo
description:
Hello everyone, its my first flash game,i made this in my high school and i was 14.

!!!THE LEGEND OF PENSHOO INSTRUCTON!!!!

If and when PENCIL shoots then it is called as PENSHOO;

PRESENTING A New Flash game:-Designed AND Programmed By Yaseen Ammaar.COPYRIGHT 2015

(i)Make sure that view is set on 100%.

(ii)Controls ARROW KEYS for LEFT, RIGHT, AND JUMP.

-SHIFT KEY for RUBBER SHOOT.

-SPACE KEY for LEAD SHOOT.

-DOWN KEY for SPECIAL.
